basic.Peptide Name: [K7, P8, K11]-IsCT (IsCT analog through amino acids substitution)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.15369808]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli KCTC 1682 (MIC=2 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637 (MIC=2 µM), Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926 (MIC=1 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917 (MIC=1 µM), Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621 (MIC=2 µM);Antibiotic-resistant bacteria:Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) CCARM 3001 (MIC=1 µM), multidrug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MDRPA) (CCARM 3543) (MIC=1 µM) and multidrug-resistant Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MDRPA) CCARM 2095 (MIC=1 µM).
